title: Data Science Process
description: The Data Science Process involves several steps: Data Collection, Data Cleaning, Data Analysis, Model Building, Model Evaluation, and Deployment. Each step is crucial for transforming raw data into actionable insights.

memoryTricks.content: CCDAME (Collection, Cleaning, Analysis, Model Building, Evaluation, Deployment)
Imagine cleaning data like washing dishes before cooking a meal.
Chunking: Break down the process into smaller steps to understand each part better.
Method of Loci: Visualize each step of the process in different rooms of your house.
Mind Palace: Create a mental palace where each room represents a step in the data science process.
Data Science Process Song: 'Collect, Clean, Analyze, Build, Evaluate, Deploy!'

mindMaps.name: Data Science Process
mindMaps.caption: Steps in the Data Science Process
